# zipcodes-regex

> A list of regular expressions for zip codes


## Install

```sh
$ npm install --save zipcodes-regex
```


## Usage

```js
var zipcodes = require('zipcodes-regex');

console.log(zipcodes)
// => "AC": "^(ASCN 1ZZ)$", "AD": "^(?:AD)*(\\d{3})$", etc
```
